lines.text: Don't ever say I never give ya nothin'.
Ya know, Chuck, you're a great guy and ya knows I'm your pal, but sometimes ya sound like you're full of hop.
Never tie yourself to a guy that's on the downgrade.
I got it on him in the wind, the speed and the noodle.
I believe if Chuck knew I was in love with you, he'd kill us both.
Yeah? What do you think I'd be doin'?
